Simulations of the model without polarization, variying gamma and kappa, but keeping the others parameters fixed.
Parameters:
{'network_size': [1500], 'memory_size': [100], 'prefferential_att': [2], 'code_length': [5], 'kappa': [0, 5, 10, 15], 'gamma': [-7, -5, -3, -1, 0, 1, 3, 5, 7], 'lambda': [0], 'alpha': [0], 'omega': [0], 'T': 150, 'num_repetitions': 5, 'seed': 42, 'path_str': PosixPath('experiments/experiment_2')}
